<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spell Gem](/Feats.aspx?ID=3518) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 51</row>

**Archetype** [Lich](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=179)

**Prerequisites**
[Lich Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3513)

</column>

---

Inspired by the degenerate [demiliches](/Monsters.aspx?ID=283) your kind sometimes devolves into, you've embedded a gem into your brow, fusing it to your necrotic flesh. This gem has been specially calibrated to hold one of the following spells: [_repulsion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=254), [_scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=268), or [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344). You must decide which spell your gem contains when you take this feat; changing the spell requires retraining the feat. Once per day, you can drain the gem's magical energy to Cast the Spell without spending a spell slot.

 At 18th level, you can heighten whichever spell you chose to 7th level. At 20th level, you can heighten whichever spell you chose to 8th level; regardless of which spell you chose, you can instead drain the gem's magical energy to cast an 8th-level [_spell turning_](/Spells.aspx?ID=297) without spending a spell slot.
name: Spell Gem
